Changes in 1.0.6

- Updated MANIFEST.in file.

Changes in 1.0.5
================

- Updated README file.

Changes in 1.0.4
================

- Add PyPy support.

Changes in 1.0.3
================

- Better README file.
- Included LICENSE file.
- Included CHANGES file.
- Use spaces instead of tabs.
- Use single quotes instead of double quotes.
- Limit line lengths to 79 characters.
